name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in backend development and cloud platforms, utilizing **GoLang**, **Python**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proven skills in designing and implementing **distributed systems** and optimizing performance through effective **debugging** and **performance-tuning**. Adept in deploying applications on **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**, and experienced in implementing **CI/CD** processes using **GitLab CI** and **ArgoCD**.
Well-versed in modern architectures including **microservices**, **REST**, and **gRPC**, with hands-on knowledge in monitoring and logging tools like **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **Loki**, and **Tempo**. Strong problem-solving mindset complemented by effective English communication skills. Previous experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms and a deep understanding of compliance-driven development practices.
